name: sketch-image-compressor
description: A Plugin that compresses bitmap assets, right when you export them. This Plugin *requires* Sketch 3.8.

scripts.build: mkdir -p "Sketch Image Compressor.sketchplugin/Contents/Resources" && skpm-build && cp -r assets/* "Sketch Image Compressor.sketchplugin/Contents/Resources"

author: Ale Mu√±oz <ale@sketchapp.com>
